line_1: From the hard Crust the baffled Teeth recoil.
line_2: But vainly weary'd with successless Toil

line_1: Ye images of Woe, no more recoil;
line_2: How Memory pains! Let some gay theme beguile

line_1: With streaming eyes and throbbing hearts recoil,
line_2: Plunge their fair forms, and dive beneath the soil. —
And catch thee in the artful Toil.

line_1: Immortal truth shall bid the shaft recoil;
line_2: And know, immortal truth shall mock thy toil:
